attributes.action: HM Queen Elizabeth II to be officially 'Elizabeth the Great'
attributes.additional_details:
Her Majesty the Queen has devoted her life to serving the United Kingdom and the Commonwealth. 

She is Britain’s longest reigned and most travelled monarch. She served in uniform in WW2. She will soon become the longest reigning Monarch in world history.

From Winston Churchill to the present day, she has been a perfect constant in our national story.
attributes.background: In this, her Platinum Jubilee year, the Government should recognise the service of Her Majesty the Queen by giving her the official epithet ‘Elizabeth the Great’.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for a monarch to be given a particular title.
